body_html:
Note that this may be a pybind11 issue--the crash is in pybind11 code, and I determined it wasn't a retro issue because I could reproduce with a random pybind11 module (pyfma) and PyTorch. I compiled both of these with mingw instead of msvc, which might also be related, since it only reproduces on Windows.

I didn't have debugging symbols but the crash appeared to be somewhere around this line: https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/326deef2ae6c535c2b1838fd7404579b3fe497b7/include/pybind11/detail/internals.h#L143

body:
Note that this may be a pybind11 issue--the crash is in pybind11 code, and I determined it wasn't a retro issue because I could reproduce with a random pybind11 module (pyfma) and PyTorch. I compiled both of these with mingw instead of msvc, which might also be related, since it only reproduces on Windows.

I didn't have debugging symbols but the crash appeared to be somewhere around this line: https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/326deef2ae6c535c2b1838fd7404579b3fe497b7/include/pybind11/detail/internals.h#L143
